cart.title: FlexiTwist B-6616 C8 Frame - Brown
cart.description: This nearly indestructible frame is the only Eye Glass frame in the world that is flexible, yet looks like any fashion acetate style. FlexiTwist is made from an innocative Swiss technology. This memory thermoplastic is the material used in all of our FlexiTwist glasses. FlexiTwists durability is a by-product of...
